entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being held by a centaur. The text describes Harry as 'the human boy' and mentions that the centaur is holding him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione made a mistake in saying something, which led to the reaction of the centaurs. The text describes Hermione as 'the human girl'.

entities.name: ronan
entities.description: Ronan is mentioned by the gray centaur as an example of someone who would take advantage of the centaurs' help. The text does not provide more information about Ronan.

entities.name: gray centaur
entities.description: The gray centaur is holding Hermione and reacting angrily to her words. The text describes the centaur as 'the gray centaur' and mentions its behavior.

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: The text refers to the centaurs as a group, mentioning their pride and independence. The text does not provide more information about the individual centaurs.

relationships.description: The gray centaur is holding Hermione, as described in the text: 'the gray centaur throwing back his head, his back legs stamping furiously, and bellowed...'
The text also mentions that the gray centaur is holding Harry: 'the gray centaur throwing back his head, his back legs stamping furiously, and bellowed...'
The text describes the centaurs as refusing to help Harry: 'We do not help humans!' snarled the centaur holding Harry...
